entity.description: White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders

text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump It’s per capita that matters, in the right places

Neither of which we have enough of

But Covid-19 is currently the number one cause of death in the US

And the 19 in covid-19 means the year not the version. Please don’t be as stupid as @KellyannePolls 

#winning
